Estimate and Save Attrition Weights

gfs_get_labelled_raw_data.Rd

TO-DO

Usage

gfs_get_labelled_raw_data(
  file,
  list.composites = NULL,
  wave = 2,
  method.income = "quintiles.top.fixed",
  .test = FALSE,
  ...
)

Arguments

file

name of file to get data from

list.composites

a lit of lists to construct composite variables

wave

(default is wave 2) but can be coerced to use wave 1 data (use wave = 1 to appropriately utilize recoding of wave 1 data)

method.income

method for how income, based on country specific labels, is recoded. Options include 'quintiles.num.fixed', 'quintiles.num.random', 'quintiles.top.fixed', ”quintiles.top.random', 'numeric'.

.test

(for internal use only)

...

other arguments

Value

a dataset with attrition weights appended

Details

Estimate (save fitted model) and append attrition weights to data.frame

Examples

{
  # TO-DO
}
